subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Scottie Reynolds and Corey Fisher each scored 17 points to help No. 3 Villanova get off to the best start in team history with a 90-72 win over Notre Dame.
snippet: Scottie Reynolds and Corey Fisher each scored 17 points to help No. 3 Villanova get off to the best start in team history with a 90-72 win over Notre Dame.
